        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="en">A video of an earthquake</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Bildschirm eines Erdbebens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un vidéo d'un tremblement de terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um vídeo de um terremoto</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα βίντεο ενός σεισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un vídeo de un terremoto</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A video of the way to behave in an office building when there is an earthquake</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earthquakes</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Bildschirm der Methode, sich in einem 
Bürohaus zu benehmen, wenn es ein Erdbeben gibt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un vidéo de la voie de se comporter dans un

          </description>
          <description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un vídeo de la manera de comportarse en un
